EmailTemplate.description: Cold Email to prospect to introduce self and program. Attach cover letter with sell sheet.
EmailTemplate.name: First Contact Email-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello from Esso
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I just wanted to take a moment to introduce myself, my name is Steve Kaye and I'm the Regional Manager for the Esso Fuel Card program in Ontario. I've recently become aware that we have reached out to you regarding our program to some degree. I specialize in working with Executives and by comparison, see if we can add any value to their current fueling methods or provide any needs they aren't receiving at the moment. I'm not here to push our program on to you or waste your time. If what you have is working for you from top to bottom, i'll be the first to tell you to stay with what you have. In reality, you are purchasing fuel with or without Esso, all i'm doing is seeing if the process can be improved upon. In most cases, Executives admit to something they would change or prefer with their current program if they had the choice. In a lot of cases, companies have been status quo for so long, they don't realize the benefits and advantages they could be receiving. Whether it be increased flexibility, more convenience, improved efficiency, heightened security, and more times than not, significant cent per liter savings! Either way, I'm hoping we can have a conversation to see if there is value we can provide you giving us the opportunity to partner with you. And if not, at least you know were are a phone call away if things change for you!
I really do appreciate your time in advance and hope to hear from you!
Regards,
{!User.Name} | {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} | {!User.Email}
Esso Business Card Services, PO Box 41023 STN BRM B, Toronto ON M7Y 7H3
